00012 namespace loos {
00013   Fmt& Fmt::scientific() { fmt = std::ios_base::scientific; return(*this); }
00014     Fmt& Fmt::fixed() { fmt = std::ios_base::fixed; return(*this); }
00015     Fmt& Fmt::general() { fmt = ~(std::ios_base::fixed|std::ios_base::scientific); return(*this); }
00016 
00017     Fmt& Fmt::precision(const uint p) { prc = p; return(*this); }
00018     Fmt& Fmt::width(const uint w) { wdth = w; return(*this); }
00019     Fmt& Fmt::fill(const char c) { fil = c; return(*this); }

00021     Fmt& Fmt::trailingZeros(bool b) { trl = b; return(*this); }
00022     Fmt& Fmt::plus(bool b) { pos = b; return(*this); }
00023 
00024     Fmt& Fmt::left(void) { ali = LEFT; return(*this); }
00025     Fmt& Fmt::right(void) { ali = RIGHT; return(*this); }
00026     Fmt& Fmt::internal(void) { ali = INTERNAL; return(*this); }

00030   BoundFmt Fmt::operator()(double d) const { return(BoundFmt(*this, d)); }
00031 
00033   std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const BoundFmt& bf) {
00034     std::ostringstream s;
00035 
00036     s.precision(bf.f.prc);
00037     s.setf(bf.f.fmt, std::ios_base::floatfield);
00038     s.width(bf.f.wdth);
00039     s.fill(bf.f.fil);
00040 
00041     switch(bf.f.ali) {
00042     case Fmt::LEFT:
00043       s.setf(std::ios_base::left, std::ios_base::adjustfield); break;
00044     case Fmt::RIGHT:
00045       s.setf(std::ios_base::right, std::ios_base::adjustfield); break;
00046     default:
00047       s.setf(std::ios_base::internal, std::ios_base::adjustfield); break;
00048     }
00049 
00050     if (bf.f.trl)
00051       s.setf(std::ios_base::showpoint);
00052     else
00053       s.unsetf(std::ios_base::showpoint);
00054 
00055     if (bf.f.pos)
00056       s.setf(std::ios_base::showpos);
00057     else
00058       s.unsetf(std::ios_base::showpos);
00059 
00060     s << bf.val;
00061 
00062     std::string ss(s.str());
00063     if (ss.size() > bf.f.wdth)
00064       ss = ss.substr(ss.size() - bf.f.wdth, bf.f.wdth);
00065 
00066     return(os << ss);
00067   }
00068 
00069 
00070 }
